# Chart.js

## Tortendiagramm



:::{#fig-tortendiagramm}
  <canvas id="myPieChart" width="600px" height="260px" style="display: block; margin: auto;"></canvas>
Ein einfaches Tortendiagramm <!-- Bildunterschrift -->
:::

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
<script>
  const ctx = document.getElementById('myPieChart').getContext('2d');
  const myPieChart = new Chart(ctx, {
    type: 'doughnut',
    data: {
      labels: ['Erfolgreich', 'Zu Spät', 'Abgebrochen'],
      datasets: [{
        label: 'Tortendiagramm',
        data: [1, 5, 2],
        backgroundColor: [
        'rgb(189, 252, 201)',
        'rgb(80, 110, 120)',
        'rgb(136, 120, 104)'
        ],
      }]
    },
    options: {
      responsive: false,
      plugins: {
        legend: {
          position: 'bottom'
        }
      }
    }
  });
</script>

@fig-tortendiagramm zeigt ein einfaches Tortendiagramm.




## Spinnendiagramm


:::{#fig-spinnengrafik}
<canvas id="radarChart" width="520px" height="260px" style="display: block; margin: auto;"></canvas>
Ein einfaches Spinnendiagramm
:::

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    var ctx = document.getElementById("radarChart").getContext("2d");
    var radarChart = new Chart(ctx, {
      type: "radar",
      data: {
        labels: ["Geschwindigkeit", "Stärke", "Ausdauer", "Flexibilität", "Koordination", "Dimension"],
        datasets: [
          {
          label: "Ist", 
          data: [80, 70, 90, 60, 85, 23],
          backgroundColor: "rgba(80, 110, 120, 0.2)",
          borderColor: "rgba(80, 110, 120, 1)",
          borderWidth: 2
          },
          {
          label: "Soll", 
          data: [80, 70, 60, 60, 41, 23],
          backgroundColor: "rgba(189, 252, 201, 0.2)",
          borderColor: "rgba(189, 252, 201, 1)",
          borderWidth: 2
          }
        ]
      },
      options: {
        responsive: true,
        scales: {
          r: {
            suggestedMin: 0,
            suggestedMax: 100
          }
        }
      }
    });
  });
</script>


## Liniendiagramm


:::{#fig-liniengrafik}
<canvas id="lineChart" width="520px" height="260px" style="display: block; margin: auto;"></canvas>
Ein einfaches Liniendiagramm mit zwei Datensätzen
:::

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    var ctx = document.getElementById("lineChart").getContext("2d");
    var lineChart = new Chart(ctx, {
      type: "line",
      data: {
        labels: ["Januar", "Februar", "März", "April", "Mai", "Juni"],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: "Umsatz 2024", 
            data: [100, 200, 150, 250, 300, 280],
            backgroundColor: "rgba(189, 252, 201, 0.2)",
            borderColor: "rgba(189, 252, 201, 1)",
            borderWidth: 2,
            fill: true,
            tension: 0.0
          },
          {
            label: "Umsatz 2023", 
            data: [90, 180, 80, 220, 270, 260],
            backgroundColor: "rgba(80, 110, 120, 0.2)",
            borderColor: "rgba(80, 110, 120, 1)",
            borderWidth: 2,
            fill: true,
            tension: 0.0
          }
        ]
      },
      options: {
        responsive: true,
        scales: {
          y: {
            beginAtZero: true
          }
        }
      }
    });
  });
</script>


## Balkendiagramm

:::{#fig-balkengrafik}
<canvas id="barChart" width="520px" height="260px" style="display: block; margin: auto;"></canvas>
Ein einfaches Balkendiagramm mit zwei Datensätzen
:::

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    var ctx = document.getElementById("barChart").getContext("2d");
    var barChart = new Chart(ctx, {
      type: "bar",
      data: {
        labels: ["Januar", "Februar", "März", "April", "Mai", "Juni"],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: "Umsatz 2024", 
            data: [100, 200, 150, 250, 300, 280],
            backgroundColor: "rgba(189, 252, 201, 0.5)",
            borderColor: "rgba(189, 252, 201, 1)",
            borderWidth: 1
          },
          {
            label: "Umsatz 2023", 
            data: [90, 180, 130, 220, 270, 260],
            backgroundColor: "rgba(80, 110, 120, 0.5)",
            borderColor: "rgba(80, 110, 120, 1)",
            borderWidth: 1
          }
        ]
      },
      options: {
        responsive: true,
        scales: {
          y: {
            beginAtZero: true
          }
        }
      }
    });
  });
</script>
